team.title: The Creative Minds Behind DesignWorks
team.description: Our diverse team of designers, strategists, and creative professionals work together to bring your vision to life.

team.name: Sarah Mitchell
team.bio: Sarah develops comprehensive brand strategies that align with business goals and resonate with target audiences.

team.bio: Emma ensures seamless project delivery and maintains strong client relationships throughout the design process.

team.bio: Lisa specializes in brand identity and digital design, creating cohesive visual experiences across all touchpoints.
